author: minchau
msg: Appling fix for XALANJ-2086, which pointed out that findCharToByteConverterMethod()
always returned null.  This bug was introduced some time ago during some security

author: minchau
msg: Committing patch for XALANJ-2077.  This performance modification is
estimated to shave 3% of the serialization stage of small documents.

author: minchau
msg: Patch from XALANJ-1924 applied. The one deprecated API used is replace
by the current one, but multiple typos in other examples are corrected.

author: minchau
msg: Committing patch from XALANJ-2082 , mostly changing javadoc from:
A few other javadoc clean ups.
Just trying to make the serializer itself less dependant on its own
high level qualifiers in its package name.

author: minchau
msg: Commiting patch for XALANJ-2095, that tabs in text nodes in XML documents
are serialized to 	 but should stay as a tab character.
